Trade/Device Name(s): EasyPlus mini Self Monitoring Blood Glucose Test System
EasyPlus mini Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EasyPlus mini Self Monitoring Blood Glucose Test System intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood for diabetes management.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from fingertips or forearm for aiding diabetes management at home or in clinical settings; not for neonate samples.
